TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TripleDESCng extends System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDES
Public NotInheritable Class TripleDESCng Inherits TripleDES
public ref class TripleDESCng sealed : System::Security::Cryptography::TripleDES

summary.span: 提供三重数据加密标准 (3DES) 算法的下一代加密技术 (CNG) 实现。

span.span: Provides a Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) implementation of the Triple Data Encryption Standard (3DES) algorithm.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 可用 (AES) 高级加密标准较新的对称加密算法。A newer symmetric encryption algorithm, Advanced Encryption Standard (AES), is available. 请考虑使用 类及其派生类（而不是 类）。Consider using the class and its derived classes instead of the class. 仅用于与旧版应用程序和数据兼容。Use only for compatibility with legacy applications and data.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

span.span: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that specify options for opening the key, such as where the key is opened from (machine or user storage) and whether to suppress UI prompting.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法对使用具有相同签名的重载创建的加密消息 进行解密。This method decrypts an encrypted message created using the overload with the same signature.

param.name: rgbKey

span.span: The secret key to use for the 3DES algorithm.

param.span: 密钥大小必须为 192 位。

span.span: The key size must be 192 bits.

param.name: rgbIV
param.span: 用于 3DES 算法的初始化向量。

span.span: The initialization vector to use for the 3DES algorithm.

summary.span: 用指定的密钥和初始化向量 (IV) 创建对称 3DES 解密器对象。

span.span: Creates a symmetric 3DES decryptor object with the specified key and initialization vector (IV).
A symmetric 3DES decryptor object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法对使用具有相同签名的重载创建的加密消息 进行解密。This method decrypts an encrypted message created using the overload with the same signature. > [!NOTE] > 如果已 使用现有的持久化密钥创建了对象，并且想要在解密消息时使用该密钥，则需要设置 属性，然后改为调用无参数 重载; 否则，使用此方法将创建参数指定的临时密钥 `rgbKey` 。If you've created the object using an existing persisted key and you want to make use of that key when decrypting the message, you want to set the property and then call the parameterless overload instead; otherwise, using this method will create an ephemeral key as specified by the `rgbKey` parameter.

span.span: is .

exception.span: 的大小对于此算法无效。

span.span: is not a valid size for this algorithm.
-or-

exception.span: 的大小与此算法的块大小不匹配。

span.span: size does not match the block size for this algorithm.

exception.span: 是此算法的已知弱密钥，不能使用。

span.span: is a known weak key for this algorithm and cannot be used.
-or-
is .

summary.span: 创建 3DES 对称加密器对象。

span.span: Creates a 3DES symmetric encryptor object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.Cryptography.ICryptoTransform CreateEncryptor() cil managed
Public Overrides Function CreateEncryptor () As ICryptoTransform

summary.span: 使用当前键和初始化向量 () 创建对称 3DES 加密器对象。

span.span: Creates a symmetric 3DES encryptor object using the current key and initialization vector ().
A symmetric 3DES encryptor object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法可以对消息进行加密，然后使用 具有相同签名的重载来解密此方法的结果。Use this method to encrypt a message and then use the overload with the same signature to decrypt the result of this method.

public override System.Security.Cryptography.ICryptoTransform CreateEncryptor (byte[] rgbKey, byte[]? rgbIV);

param.name: rgbKey

span.span: The secret key to use for the 3DES algorithm.

param.span: 密钥大小必须为 192 位。

span.span: The key size must be 192 bits.

param.name: rgbIV
param.span: 用于 3DES 算法的初始化向量。

span.span: The initialization vector to use for the 3DES algorithm.

summary.span: 用指定的密钥和初始化向量 (IV) 创建对称 3DES 加密器对象。

span.span: Creates a symmetric 3DES encryptor object with the specified key and initialization vector (IV).
A symmetric 3DES encryptor object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法可以对消息进行加密，然后使用 具有相同签名的重载来解密此方法的结果。Use this method to encrypt a message and then use the overload with the same signature to decrypt the result of this method. > [!NOTE] > 如果已 使用现有的持久化密钥创建了对象，并且想要在加密消息时使用该密钥，则需要设置 属性，然后改为调用无参数 重载; 否则，使用此方法将创建参数指定的临时密钥 `rgbKey` 。If you've created the object using an existing persisted key and you want to make use of that key when encrypting the message, you want to set the property and then call the parameterless overload instead; otherwise, using this method will create an ephemeral key as specified by the `rgbKey` parameter.

exception.span: 是此算法的已知弱密钥，不能使用。

span.span: is a known weak key for this algorithm and cannot be used.

span.span: Generates a random key to use for the 3DES algorithm.

MemberSignature.Value: public override byte[] Key { get; set; }
Public Overrides Property Key As Byte()
public: virtual property cli::array <System::Byte> ^ Key { cli::array <System::Byte> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <System::Byte> ^ value); };
member this.Key : byte[] with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 算法的密钥。

span.span: Gets or sets the key for the algorithm.
The key for the algorithm.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已 使用现有的持久化密钥创建了对象，则在读取属性的值时 ，将会尝试导出该密钥。If you've created the object using an existing persisted key, when you read the value of the property, an attempt to export the key will be made. 在这种情况下，如果密钥不可导出，则 会引发。In this case, if the key is not exportable, a will be thrown. 除此之外，如果设置属性的值 ，将不再使用持久化的密钥，而是使用临时密钥。In addition to that, if you set the value of the property, the persisted key will no longer be used and a temporary key will be used instead. 如果需要再次使用持久性密钥，则需要创建类的新实例 。If you need to use the persisted key again, a new instance of class needs to be created.

MemberSignature.Value: public override int KeySize { get; set; }
Public Overrides Property KeySize As Integer
public: virtual property int KeySize { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.KeySize : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 算法所用密钥的大小（以位为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the size, in bits, of the secret key used by the algorithm.

value.span: 算法所用密钥的大小（以位为单位）。

span.span: The size, in bits, of the secret key used by the algorithm.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已 使用现有持久性密钥创建了对象，并设置了属性的值，则将 不再使用持久化密钥，而是使用临时密钥。If you've created the object using an existing persisted key and you set the value of the property, the persisted key will no longer be used and a temporary key will be used instead. 如果需要再次使用持久性密钥，则需要创建类的新实例 。If you need to use the persisted key again, a new instance of class needs to be created.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property LegalKeySizes As KeySizes()
public: virtual property cli::array <System::Security::Cryptography::KeySizes ^> ^ LegalKeySizes { cli::array <System::Security::Cryptography::KeySizes ^> ^ get(); };
